subject: Television
Baseball
lead_paragraph: How and when All-Star Game rosters should be released are concerns that led M.L.B. to tell ESPN that it could not use a studio set at AT&T Park for “Baseball Tonight” and “SportsCenter.”
snippet: How and when All-Star Game rosters should be released are concerns that led M.L.B. to tell ESPN that it could not use a studio set at AT&T Park for “Baseball Tonight” and “SportsCenter.”
